WELCOME_MESSAGE: Hey there! I'm Skegg, your friendly AI assistant. I can answer your questions, generate images, and much more. Just send me a message and I’ll do my best to help!
HELP_MESSAGE:
You can send me text, voice messages, or images (with captions for extra context), and I’ll handle them using ChatGPT. For image generation, just send a text prompt and I’ll use DALL·E.

Commands:
/select – Choose between ChatGPT or DALL·E
/identify – Verify your account to access the bot
/language – Switch the bot's language
/reset – Reset conversation history
/help – Show this help message
SELECT_MODEL:
Choose a model to work with:
- DALL·E for image generation
- ChatGPT for conversation and image analysis
ACCOUNT_UNDER_REVIEW: Your account is currently under review. We'll notify you once the verification is complete.
IDENTIFY_MESSAGE: Please verify your account by clicking the button below. Our team will review your request shortly.
UNVERIFIED_ERROR: You need to verify your account to continue. Use /identify and press the button to start the process.
ALREADY_VERIFIED: You're already verified. You're good to go!
SENT_TO_VERIFICATION: We've received your verification request. Please wait while we review it.
SELECTED_CHATGPT: You’ve selected ChatGPT. Ready to chat!
SELECTED_DALLE: You’ve selected DALL·E. Let’s get creative!
PROCESSING_VOICE: Heard you loud and clear! Preparing a response...
DALLE_IMAGE_PROMPT_ERROR: Oops! DALL·E can’t process this image. Try using ChatGPT instead.
GPT_DEFAULT_IMAGE_CAPTION_PROMPT: How would you describe this photo?
APPROVAL_CONGRATS: Congrats! You’ve been approved to use the bot.
RESET_CONVERSATION: Conversation history has been reset. You’re starting fresh!
